description: This file contains CSS styles for managing themes in a two-player tic-tac-toe application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application class, styled for center alignment and background management.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application, styled for layout and background.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Logo styling for the application with animation effects.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link styling within the application with color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button styling for toggling themes, with hover and active state effects.
